description.name: Aluminium Oxide Flap Disc 125mm Grit 100
description.long_desc:
Heavy duty aluminium oxide cloth bonded to fibreglass backing disc. Abrasive segments glued to fibreglass disc with steel reinforcing ring.


Product Features



  • Ideal for grinding, finishing, stock removal and weld dressing

  • Fibreglass carrier plate

  • For use with hand-held angle grinders

  • Suitable for use on steel, cast iron, alloys & wood


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole: 22,2 mm

  • Grit: 100

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200
description.short_desc:
Heavy duty aluminium oxide cloth bonded to fibreglass backing disc. Abrasive segments glued to fibreglass disc with steel reinforcing ring.

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Hole: 22,2 mm

  • Grit: 100

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200

description.name: Hook and Loop Flexible Backing Pad 150mm for Air Sander
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Backing pad with velcro

  • Semi-flexible edge and six holes for dust extraction

  • For use with hook and loop polishing sponges, bonnets and sanding discs

  • Compatible with air sander polishers


Technical Data



  • Thread: 5/16" x 24

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Pad Thickness: 11 mm

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 10000

description.name: Abrasive disc with velcro 125mm P240
Aluminium Oxide Cloth Sanding Belts 75x457mm Grit 24
description.long_desc:
Aluminium Oxide sanding belts. Suitable for wood, paint, varnish, plastics, plasters and light metal sanding.


Product Features



  • Aluminium Oxide grain

  • Resin bonded to backing cloth

  • Fits all 75 x 457mm sanders


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Belt Length: 457 mm

  • Belt Width: 75 mm

  • Grit: 24

description.name: Diamond Turbo Grinding Cup Wheel 125mm 5mm RED
description.long_desc:
Diamond Cup Wheel ideal for concrete surface preperation, also for paint and adhesive removal.


Technical Data



  • Blade Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Diamond Segment Height: 5 mm
description.short_desc:
Diamond Cup Wheel ideal for concrete surface preperation, also for paint and adhesive removal.

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

category.name: Stone Grinding Discs
category.path: Cutting Tools\Cutting and Grinding Discs\Stone Grinding Discs

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Cutting and Grinding Discs\Stone Grinding Discs

description.name: Diamond Grinding Cup Wheel Double Row 5mm 125x22,2mm
description.long_desc:
Diamond Cup Wheel ideal for grinding concrete, masonry and a variety of other applications. The double row configuration provides a smoother finish.


Product Features



  • Ideal for use on concrete and masonry

  • Fast and aggressive grinding

  • Hardened steel body

  • Can be used wet or dry

  • Compatible with 22,23mm bore angle grinders


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Diamond Segment Height: 5 mm
description.short_desc:

  • Compatible with 22,23mm bore angle grinders

  • Diamond Segment Height: 5 mm
